TopicTitle: KSP freezing whole computer after start of the game.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys!
So, since two days ago I have the problem with KSP, that after I start the game, it has a blackscreen and it freezes my whole PC, audio included. I have a few mods installed (Modular Launch Pads, Shuttle Orbiter Konstruktion Kit, reDirect for SOCK, Feline Utility Rovers), but most of my mods are just enhancing the gameplay (mechjeb or Kerbalengineer). I got it to start two times yesterday, but at the third time it froze again.
 

Has someone here got a solution for this?

You must have some hardware or driver issues.

No userspace software should be able to lock up the OS.
